name: Mahesh.dev
tagline: A terminal-inspired portfolio for a software developer.
aboutMe: Aspiring software developer with a passion for building efficient and scalable applications. Currently exploring new technologies and honing my skills in web development and algorithms. Always eager to learn and contribute to challenging projects.

projects.title: Algo Sphere
projects.description: A code snippets platform that consists of almost all major algorithm code snippets in major languages (C++, Java, JavaScript, Python).

projects.title: Chess in Java
projects.description: A chess game written in Java with JFrame and Swing. This game enforces all major chess rules including castling, en passant, and pawn promotion.
features: Castling, en passant, and pawn promotion

projects.title: Anime browsing website
projects.description: A website that allows users to browse and search for anime series and movies.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A calculator application that allows users to perform basic arithmetic operations.

responsibilities: Seeking a challenging role in software development.
Actively developing personal projects to enhance skills.
Proficient in modern web technologies and software development principles.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
education.institution: Swarna Bharathi Institute of Science and Technology
